summary: A Federal Express invoice dated August 14, 2000, for J. Epstein & Co. Inc., detailing shipping charges for numerous packages sent in late July and early August 2000. The document shows shipments to and from various Epstein-associated individuals and properties, revealing a network of connections and frequent package deliveries.

persons.name: J. Epstein & Co. Inc.
persons.context: The corporate entity billed for all FedEx shipments listed in the invoice, with its address at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY.

persons.name: Mrs. Sherman
persons.context: Listed as the contact for the shipping address on the invoice for J. Epstein & Co. Inc.

persons.name: Lauren Kwatner
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight package from J. Epstein & Co. Inc., delivered to New Albany, OH on August 1, 2000.

persons.name: Antoinette Atiandoe
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope sent to Zorro Ranch in Stanley, NM, delivered on August 1, 2000.

persons.name: Jeffrey Schontz
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope sent to an address in New Albany, OH, delivered on August 2, 2000.

persons.name: Abigail Wexner
persons.context: Co-recipient with Jeffrey Schontz of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope sent to New Albany, OH.

persons.name: Antoinette
persons.context: Listed as the sender on multiple packages from J. Epstein & Co. Inc. and as the recipient of a package from Peg Ugland. Appears to be a staff member handling shipping.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Recipient of multiple FedEx packages sent to his Palm Beach, FL address (358 El Brillo Way) and another location. Also listed as a sender in one instance.

persons.name: Peg Ugland
persons.context: Recipient of a package from J. Epstein & Co. Inc. and sender of a package to Antoinette. Associated with New Albany Property Inc.

persons.name: Larry Visosky
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope delivered on August 8, 2000. Also listed as the sender on a package to Jack Lchaa.

persons.name: Jack Lchaa
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope sent by Larry Visosky to Sound City.

persons.name: Eric Gany
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight box sent from J. Epstein & Co. Inc., delivered on August 8, 2000.

persons.name: J0141 Alessi
persons.context: Listed as the sender on a package from J. Epstein & Co. Inc. to Eric Gany.

persons.name: Gary Kerney
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight Pak sent to South Padre Island Golf Course.

persons.name: Nancy Davidson
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope sent to Global Crossing.

persons.name: Michael Doss
persons.context: Recipient of a large (35 lb) FedEx 2Day package, paid for by a third party, delivered on July 27, 2000.

connections.description: The corporate entity is used to pay for shipping packages to and from Jeffrey Epstein's personal addresses.
Antoinette appears to be a staff member handling shipping logistics for Epstein, sending and receiving packages on behalf of J. Epstein & Co. Inc.
Peg Ugland is associated with New Albany Property Inc., as packages are addressed there.
Both are listed as co-recipients of a package sent to the same address in New Albany, OH.
Larry Visosky sent a package to Jack Lchaa at Sound City.
The company paid for a package sent to Antoinette Atiandoe at Zorro Ranch.

events.title: Package to Michael Doss
events.description: A large 35 lb package is shipped via FedEx 2Day to Michael Doss, paid for by a third party.

events.title: FedEx Shipping Activity
events.description: A two-week period of intensive package shipping activity billed to J. Epstein & Co. Inc., involving at least 21 airbills to various individuals and properties.

events.title: Invoice Issued
events.description: Federal Express issues invoice number 5-541.59418 to J. Epstein & Co. Inc. for $400.32 in shipping charges.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6809 (J. Epstein & Co. Inc. headquarters)
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480 (Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence)
Zorro Ranch, 49 Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, NM 87056
New Albany Property Inc., New Albany, OH
One Whitebarn Rd, New Albany, OH 43054
6525W Campus Oval Ste 105, New Albany, OH 43054
1315 Albers Street, Van Nuys, CA 91401 (Incorrect address on a package)
keyFacts: J. Epstein & Co. Inc. maintained an active FedEx account (1144-2081-6) for frequent shipping in mid-2000.
Packages were shipped to multiple Epstein-associated properties, including his Palm Beach home and Zorro Ranch in New Mexico.
The invoice reveals a network of individuals (Antoinette, Peg Ugland, Larry Visosky, etc.) sending and receiving packages through Epstein's corporate account.
One package was a large 35 lb shipment to Michael Doss, paid for by a third party.
The document provides a snapshot of logistical and communication networks within Epstein's circle during this period.
